metadata.title: CVE-2021-28700 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: xen/arm: No memory limit for dom0less domUs The dom0less feature allows anadministrator to create multiple unprivileged domains directly from Xen.Unfortunately, the memory limit from them is not set. This allow a domainto allocate memory beyond what an administrator originally configured.

criterions.comment: xen package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
